targets.query: SELECT count("value") FROM "chain.election" WHERE $timeFilter -10m GROUP BY time($__interval), "miner" fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean("value")) FROM "chain.blocktime" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "chain.miner_power" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "chain.miner_power" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "miner" fill(previous)
SELECT top("value", "miner",20) FROM "chain.miner_power" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "miner"
SELECT count("value") FROM "chain.miner_power" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "chain.message_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "method", "exitcode", "actor" fill(null)
